title.rendered: Microfiber Cleaning Cloth Towels – Large 27″ x 16″ 300 GSM

content.rendered:
• 【 Easier Cleaning and Drying Ever 】Cleans without chemicals, Each tiny micro fiber has incredible surface with much more room to bind dirt and liquids wiped clean easily, not to mention your 16″ x 27″ GSM 300 high plush ultra soft microfiber wash cloths.
  • 【 Surface Safe Scratch Free 】 Double sided microfiber cleaning procedure is very environmentally friendly. Aalternative to traditional spraying and wiping. Thicker fiber is a perfect cleaning solution can be achieved with only water.
  • 【 1 Step to Clean Detailing Tool 】 You will be surprised to complete your cleaning work at an amazing speed! Just spray water and wipe surfaces with streak free microfiber cleaning towels on your Kitchen Countertop, Windows, Furniture or Car.
  • 【 No Remaining Stripe 】 Microfiber cleaning towels with higher water absorption will clean up moisture and lint on a surface as much as possible because 80% Polyester 20% Polyamide fibers are non-abrasive, scratch free and lint free.
  • 【 Saving is Wise 】 Could be you last pack of microfiber rags because total reusable and washable, fibers will replace mounds of paper towels. Attractive colors of durable microfiber will not fade and last much longer than cotton towels.
